FuncDef:
The ptp-adaptive atr enable command enables 1588 ATR on an interface.
The undo ptp-adaptive atr enable command disables 1588 ATR on an interface.
By default, 1588 ATR is disabled on an interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable 1588 ATR on an interface to improve the time synchronization accuracy, run the ptp-adaptive atr enable command.
This command applies only to 1588 ATR.
Configuration Impact
If 1588 ATR is not enabled on an interface, the time synchronization performance will be affected.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
This command is run on the outbound interface used to transmit 1588 ATR packets.
This command cannot be run on an OTN subcard.
